data.subject: Windstorm in Wichita
data.lyric:

data.subject: Meet Me at Midnight
data.lyric:

 At the little place on Broadway
 While you stir your coffee

data.subject: Your Love (Lights Me Up)
data.lyric:
Sundays are bluer than my Mondays
 But you waltz away the grey haze
 Swaying in your daisy sun dress

data.subject: Long Lost Lover
data.lyric:
It took two seconds for me to see
 When your suitcase hit the floor
 Our past two years of memories
